oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Delilah Angus Evans and child
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy of a portrait of Delilah Angus Evans holding an infant. Evans was the wife of Capt. Robert Laird Evans, Co. I, 53rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Family lore says that Evans carried the original portrait in the breast pocket of his coat during the Civil War.
